price: 35. Mpe okozala na botutu kino mokolo mwa suka.
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
